master of the hellish yard

"This place that shouldn't have existed, the time has come to return all of it to nothing."
G

The story of the Master of the Hellish Yard preparing to destroy hell.

Lyrics

Versions

  • Original: The original version of the song released on The Muzzle of Nemesis.

Albums

Notes

  • As the third song in the Four Endings series, it is preceeded by master of the court and succeeded by master of the heavenly yard.
  • The lyrics reference the famous quote from J. Robert Oppenheimer regarding the first test of an atomic bomb.
  • The lyrics page in The Muzzle of Nemesis indicates that the song takes place in EC 998.
